name: Hampton Inn & Suites Chino Hills

reviews.text: We really enjoyed our stay at the Hampton Inn Chino Hills in May 2007. The facility appeared to be brand new and clean. The rooms were well maintained and comfortable. There is a small business room off the lobby that had a computer with internet access and fax. A small fitness room was also available. The complementary breakfast was not elaborate, but was adequete for a light breakfast. The staff was friendly and helpful. The location of the hotel is in a new area - movie theater, Starbucks, pizza place all within walking distance. Very affordable. Would definetely stay here again.
reviews.title: Wonderful affordable hotel

aka: Hampton Inn & Suites Chino Hills Hotel
